page.title: 13 SOUTH NUTFIELD
page.content: {South Nutfield}is a very friendly village ,it is quite small.There is a {Church School}in the centre, so we don't have to walk a long way to school. Just up the road,there is a park with{swings}and a{slide.} In South Nutfield there are{six {shops, a{newsagent,a garage,a Post {Office,two grocers and a butchers.} There is a{Village Hall,}a{railway {station}and a{church}very near which was built nearly a{hundred years ago. It is surrounded by agricultural land, and there are lots of beautiful trees. Most of the houses have gardens, and there is not much traffic. We think{South Nutfield}is a nice place to live in.
